title: Tristana went full blue??
body:
So in doing just a simple bot game with a few friends, not only was tristana's splash art completely bugged (don't have an image for), her model went completely blue.  Her other particles and icons were fine, but her model in itself was just...well blue.

This was not just on my screen alone.  The 2 friends i played with also said they saw her in this state.

replies.body: These chroma packs are getting out of hand.

Heyo! This is indeed a bug---not a Blue Man Group Tristana chroma _unfortunately_. This should not be occurring now though! I will keep monitoring the boards in case it happens to still be occurring with Tristana bot. Thanks for the report, Baron VonSilvermoon! :P

I have been dubbed a Baron by a Rioter.
My day is made.

> [{quoted}](name=VonSilvermoon,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=dn1v2kzU,comment-id=00090000,timestamp=2015-05-01T19:24:27.516+0000)
>
> I have been dubbed a Baron by a Rioter.
> My day is made.

*bows* I am honored to have brightened the day of such an esteemed individual. :]

Btw is your name a reference to the Silvermoon region in Quel'Thalas? :o
Just be lucky she didn't do this!
Tristana went full blue?You never go full blue.
I saw it too. Even posted a pic of it in anothers post to prove it. I was laughing so hard... Poor trist.. sorry.. x3

This happened to me with Janna once.  It was quite hilarious seeing all her abilities (her tornado was an eyesore when blowing across the screen) and bird in that rich blue color {{champion:40}} .  Thought I was going crazy, because I seemed to have been the only one seeing it like that.  

Also, I'd like to point out how amazing the save name for that picture is.
it probably has something to do with her chroma that isn't out yet.
The skin name said something about tristana_skin_8 or somesuch, too.
